archimate:Requirement.name: SD.1.4.7: Quality reviews should be signed off at agreed checkpoints by the business owner of the system under development, an information security specialist, the head of system development (or equivalent) and the individual who will be responsible for maintaining systems in the live environment.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
